title: Telemarketer/ Sales Representative
job_overview:
Sales Representative (Remote)
Join Upgrade to see actual info and help us expand globally! We're hiring a results-driven Sales Representative to connect with clients, promote our services, and grow participation in our compensation surveys.

What You’ll Do:

* Contact potential clients via phone and email
* Sell Upgrade to see actual info services worldwide
* Drive participation in compensation and benefits surveys
* Use sales tools to find new opportunities
* Forecast and report on territory performance
* Join weekly meetings and ongoing training


What We’re Looking For:

* Graduate of any Bachelor's Degree (required)
* At least 1 year of BPO experience (required)
* Strong verbal and written communication skills
* Team player who can also work independently


Perks & Benefits:

* Work from Home
* Paid Training
* Weekends Off
* Competitive Base Pay + Bonuses + Commissions

Sound like you? Apply now and grow with us!
